Title: Requires state and county boards of elections to post sample ballots online at least twelve days prior to the first day of early voting
Summary: Requires state and county boards of elections to post sample ballots online at least twelve days prior to the first day of early voting; requires such ballots to be posted in a searchable database.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to requiring state and county boards of elections to post sample ballots
